QuestData.Title: New Beginnings
QuestData.Description: There's never been danger of centaur attack this far north before. Someone put 'em up to it, I just know it!$b$bRegardless, I'm wiped out. I had everything invested in this haul.$b$bFortunately, there's one thing no centaur can take from me and that's goblin ingenuity! I'll start from scratch and build an empire!$b$b<Bizby spots a scorpion in the distance.>$b$bThere's always a market for poison. Whatdya say, friend?
QuestData.CompletionText: Let's have a look at those scorpion tails, friend.
QuestData.RewardText: This is how I got my start, you know.$b$bSlingin' poison to the rogues in Orgrimmar. Ahh, those were the days....
